title: Papa no Iukoto wo Kikinasai!
title_en: Listen to Me, Girls. I Am Your Father!
title_jp: パパのいうことを聞きなさい！
synopsis: Segawa Yuta is a freshman of a university. He lost his parents when he was small and was raised by his sister Yuri. Yuta has been living alone since Yuri got married to a middle aged man when Yuta was a junior high student.
